requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
class_notes: Must enroll in Chem 205. The class will be a mostly synchronous with a few asynchronous online activities. Two exams will be scheduled during class time. A computer, webcam, microphone, and internet access are required for this course.
course_description: Chem 205L will connect your understanding of the interaction of light and matter to the determination of molecular structure through spectroscopic methods. Students will assign atomic/ molecular spectra and analyze results to determine critical properties of the compound using rigorous math on real molecules. Students who withdraw from the laboratory course must withdraw from the co-requisite lecture course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites: [(CHEM_OX 203 and CHEM_OX 203L) or (CHEM 203 and CHEM 203L)] and (MATH_OX 111 or MATH 111) as prerequisites or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4272, Section #: 1, Type: LAB, Campus: OXF, Meets: W 6-8:55p, Instructor: S. Nkomo, Status: Open
